page.title: 05Amenities and recreation
page.content: There is a recreation ground in Little Shelford, near the centre.This has many useable facilities.In the summer the council have a cricket pitch for the villagers to use.They also have a large bowling green and next to this there are three tennis courts.As well as these, they have swings and such like next to the pavillion. There are twenty seven shops in the village,all very regulary used including a Library, two Banks, a Dentist,a Fishmonger and a Chemist and a Dairy.About fifteen years ago virtually all the shops would have been private houses.
